Title: Extends the amount of time before certain reports to the statewide central register regarding abuse and maltreatment are expunged
Summary: Extends the amount of time before reports to the statewide central register regarding child abuse and maltreatment can be expunged from ten years to fifteen years after the eighteenth birthday of the youngest child named in the report.
LawCode: Amd ยง422, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to extending the amount of time before certain reports to the statewide central register regarding abuse and maltreatment are expunged
